```{r include=FALSE}
label <- case_geo %>%  
  mutate(Details = paste0(
    "<a href='"
                 , Details
                 , "' target='_blank'>"
                 , "Click Here</a>"))
```

```{r echo=FALSE, fig.height=6, fig.width=10}
library(leaflet)
leaflet() %>%
  addProviderTiles(providers$Stamen.Toner) %>% 
  addCircleMarkers(data = case_geo,
                   lng = case_geo$lon,
                   lat = case_geo$lat,
                   fillColor = "#E7451F",
                   color = "#E7451F",
                   weight = 0,
                   radius = 12,
                   fillOpacity = 0.5,
                   popup = leafpop::popupTable(label %>% select(-lon, -lat, -address), 
                                               feature.id = FALSE, row.numbers = FALSE),
                   popupOptions = popupOptions(minWidth = 400, maxWidth = 550, closeOnClick = TRUE)
) %>% 
  setView(lng = 40, lat = 20, zoom = 1.5)
```
